title: Risk of Rain 2 ‘Survivors of the Void’ is now available on Google Stadia, months ahead of consoles
content:
After debuting on PC earlier this year, Risk of Rain 2 has officially released its “Survivors of the Void” expansion on Google Stadia, months ahead of when console players will get their chance to play the long-awaited DLC.

more…

The post Risk of Rain 2 ‘Survivors of the Void’ is now available on Google Stadia, months ahead of consoles appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Months ahead of its console debut, Risk of Rain 2 has just released its first expansion, Survivors of the Void, on Google Stadia.
